item.title: Create AWS Vpc and Ec2 via Terraform
item.description: What we will do Create new VPC Create an Internet Gateway and a NAT gateway Define subnets Create security group Create EC2 instance Integration with gitlab CI Define terraform file We will create few .tf files: backend.tf for integration with gitlab CI, we need save state file on AWS S3 bucket, otherwise Terraform will create resources every time we run CI pipeline. terraform { backend "s3" { key = "terraform-pipeline/terraform.
